dialogStrings: Mystery House
Chocobo Sage's House
Wark!

“Ho ho.
It's unusual for people to
come to such an out of the way place…”

“I can't remember how long it's
been since my last guest.”

{Cloud}
“Who are you?”

{Tifa}
“Who are you?”

{Cid}
“Who are you?”

“Me?
I'm…”
“I don't know.”

{Cloud}
“You don't know who
you are?”

{Tifa}
“Wha?
You don't know who you are?”

{Cid}
“Huh? You're sayin' you don't even
know who you are?”

“Been a while since
I gave it any thought…”{PAUSE}“What was it they used to call me?”

“Oh yeah!!
They used to call me the 'Chocobo Sage'.
That's right!!”{PAUSE}“Right, that was it,
The Chocobo Sage!!”

{Cloud}
(No one would forget that)

{Tifa}
(Who would forget that?)

{Cid}
(The hell's wrong with this guy?)

Chocobo Sage
“Now what can I do for you?”

{CHOICE}Sell me something?
{CHOICE}What about that Chocobo?
{CHOICE}Nothing

{CHOICE}Sell me something?
{CHOICE}You remember anything?
{CHOICE}Nothing

Chocobo Sage
“That Chocobo?
Well that one is…”

Chocobo Sage
“Let's see now,
I don't quite remember…”

Chocobo Sage
“I remember now!
That's the one they call…”{PAUSE}“It's a Mountain Chocobo.
And like the name says,
he can cross any mountain.”{PAUSE}“There is another one that
can cross rivers, too.
They call him a 'River Chocobo'.”

{Cloud}
“Where can we catch one?”

{Tifa}
“Where can we find one?”

{Cid}
“Where can I get one of those
Whatdyacallem Chocobos?”

Chocobo Sage
“There aren't any around now.”

{Cloud}
“…
That's one right there, isn't it?”

{Tifa}
“What about that one
right there?”

{Cid}
“What're you flappin' about?
There's one right there!”

Chocobo Sage
“Wha?
I wonder what he's doing there?”

Chocobo Sage
“Can't remember for the life of me…”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh, oh yeah!
That Chocobo…”{PAUSE}“…was bred from a
'Great Chocobo' and a
'Good Chocobo'.”{PAUSE}“If you give them "Carob Nuts"
during breeding, there's a chance
you'll get one of these Chocobos.”

{Cloud}
“So where's this Chocobo?”{PAUSE}“So where can I get some
of these 'Carob Nuts'?”

{Tifa}
“So where can I
find those Chocobos?”{PAUSE}“…And what about those 'Carob Nuts'?

{Cid}
“So where is this Chocobo?”{PAUSE}“And what about
those nut things?”

Chocobo Sage
“Huh? Where?
Where was that?”{PAUSE}“And what was
that nut?”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh, OK. I remember!
That Chocobo…”{PAUSE}“…Is on an island southeast of here,
In a place called Mideel
surrounded by greenery.”{PAUSE}“You should be able to catch one
just west of Mideel. And some
'Carob Nuts', too.”{PAUSE}“There used to be some monsters
just south of here that
had them. Or you might…”

“…
Funny…I forgot
What I was saying just now.”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh right!”{PAUSE}“It was about the Mountain Chocobo
and the River Chocobo
I told you about.”{PAUSE}“When you mate these two
together…”{PAUSE}“…You get one that can
cross rivers AND mountains.”

“And…
And…uh, what was I saying?”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh, yeah!
And also…”{PAUSE}“There's one that
can cross oceans, too!”

{Cloud}
“You probably
don't remember but…”{PAUSE}“How can I get one of
those Chocobos?”

{Tifa}
“You probably forgot
already but…
“How can I get one of
those Chocobos?”

{Cid}
Great! I know you
probably already forgot but,”{PAUSE}“Where can I get one
of those Chocobos?”

Chocobo Sage
“Hey, don't talk like that!
To get an Ocean-crossing Chocobo, you just…”

Chocobo Sage
“Let's see now…
…Nope. Don't remember a thing.”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh, I remember!
The Ocean-crossing Chocobo is…”{PAUSE}“The Mountain-and-River-crossing
Chocobo is…uh…
Oh, what was I saying?”

Chocobo Sage
“Right, right! I remember! You take
the Mountain-and-River-crossing Chocobo…”{PAUSE}“Mate it with a 'Wonderful Chocobo'
you can catch right around here…
And you'll get…”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh, right!
You'll need a…”{PAUSE}“'Zeio Nut'.
Now let me see,
as I remember, the Zeio Nut…”{PAUSE}“Where was it you could
find those things?”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh yeah!
Zeio Nuts…”{PAUSE}“Are the favorite of goblins.
There's a small island east of here
where the goblins have a bunch of them.”

Chocobo Sage
“I think…”{PAUSE}“…that's all
I'm gonna remember.”

Chocobo Sage
“Oh!”{PAUSE}“That's it…”
